usage: A chest for players to store and take treasures
interactivity: its hinged lid could be opened
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the treasure chest and use their hands to make contact with the lid. The interaction will likely involve a pressing motion to push the lid open, utilizing a sustained contact method with the palms or fingers. The chest's hinged lid will respond by swinging open, allowing users to access the treasures inside. The wooden texture will provide a tactile feedback, giving a sense of realism as users feel the surface while interacting.

usage: players will use it to open a tresure chest
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the key using a precision grip, holding it between their thumb and index finger. The interaction will involve a turning motion as they insert the key into the lock of the treasure chest. The smooth finish of the key will provide a pleasant tactile sensation, while the ring-shaped holding part allows for easy manipulation. Users may also perform a slight twisting action to engage the lock mechanism, enhancing the interaction experience.

usage: players will use it to smash things
inertia: relatively heavy with the center of mass concentrated at one end
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the Hammer Dispenser 2 using a power grip, wrapping their hand around the round handle. The interaction will involve lifting the hammer and swinging it downwards to smash objects. The relatively heavy design, with the center of mass concentrated at one end, will provide a realistic inertia sensation, making users feel the weight as they lift and swing. The hammer will respond to the user's actions with a satisfying impact feedback when it strikes an object, simulating a real hammering experience.

usage: players will punch it for blowing off steam
outline: the punching bag is positioned on the ground. make sure a proxy's volume covers this punching bag
hardness: feeling a little bit soft while punching
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the Scarecrow punching bag and use their fists to make contact. The interaction will involve a punching motion, where users will strike the bag with their fists, applying a momentary tap. The bag's soft feel will provide a cushioning effect upon impact, allowing users to blow off steam effectively. The punching bag's position on the ground will encourage users to stand and engage in a physical workout, with the bag swaying slightly upon being hit, simulating a real-life punching experience.
